#summary Architecture of OneSync

== Architecture ==

The UI will with interact with SyncClient and SyncAgent. SyncClient is a 

controller class which manages all providers for business objects. 

SyncAgent is the class that does the synchronization.

The business objects are
  * SyncJob
  * SyncSource
  * SyncActions
  * Metadata
